resources.string: This is the bird info view

The elusive Penguino. This slippery bird lives behind trees, avoiding the public eye when ever possible. It loves eating fish, pine cones and leaves. If you are lucky enough to catch one be sure to keep him/her in your list of Bonged Birds!

The common Yellow Duck. This little pricker flew in from Angry Birds and is quite common indeed. Not hard to catch but you still have to get one to say "Yes, I have one!". Likes to stay out on the field and can be fast in its movements. Eats worms, tells dirty jokes and is very amicable company.

The Wood Pecker of the bunch. This fellow is somewhat rare to be seen. He stays up high in the trees and pecks away on the fresh pine trees. Likes to make holes in everything. Horrible movie company. Eats anything it can find, drinks heavily and plays backgammon for some reason. Has a black belt in Sudoku. Not to be taken lightly.
